DraftStockTransactionLocation.description: ID of draft stock transaction storage location associated with this serial or batch number.

DraftTransactionID.description: ID representing a group of serial or batch numbers being reserved for use in a subsequent stock transaction

IsDraft.description: Boolean value indicating if this serial or batch number is being reserved

ParentID.description: ID of the main item. Only applicable for assembled item

PicklistLine.description: ID of picking list associated with this serial or batch number.

PickOrderLine.description: ID of pick order associated with this serial or batch number.

PurchaseTransaction.description: ID of purchase transaction associated with this serial or batch number.

Quantity.description: Quantity of this serial or batch number entering or leaving inventory

SalesReturnLine.description: ID of sales return associated with this serial or batch number.

SalesTransaction.description: ID of sales transaction associated with this serial or batch number.

StockTransactionID.description: ID of the stock transaction in which this serial or batch number was used

StockTransactionLocation.description: ID of stock transaction location associated with this serial or batch number.

StockTransactionType.description: Type of stock transaction associated with this serial or batch number. Available values: 10 = Opening balance 120 = Goods delivery 121 = Sales return 122 = Stock out (Drop shipment) 123 = Stock in (Drop shipment return) 124 = Warehouse transfer delivery 125 = Location Transfer Delivery 130 = Goods receipt 131 = Purchase return 132 = Stock in (Drop shipment) 133 = Stock out (Drop shipment return) 134 = Warehouse transfer receipt 135 = Location Transfer Receipt 140 = Shop order stock receipt 141 = Shop order stock reversal 147 = Shop order by-product receipt 148 = Shop order by-product reversal 150 = Requirement issue 151 = Requirement reversal 155 = Subcontract issue 156 = Subcontract return 160 = Receipt (Assembly) 161 = Return receipt (Disassembly) 165 = Issue (Assembly) 166 = Return issue (Disassembly) 180 = Stock revaluation 181 = Financial revaluation 195 = Stock count 196 = Adjust stock - out 197 = Adjust stock - in 200 = Trade-in

StorageLocation.description: Storage location which this serial or batch number is entering or leaving

StorageLocationCode.description: Code of the storage location which this serial or batch number is entering or leaving

StorageLocationDescription.description: Description of the storage location which this serial or batch number is entering or leaving

Warehouse.description: Warehouse which this serial or batch number is entering or leaving

WarehouseCode.description: Code of the warehouse which this serial or batch number is entering or leaving

WarehouseDescription.description: Description of the warehouse which this serial or batch number is entering or leaving

WarehouseTransferLine.description: ID of warehouse transfer associated with this serial or batch number.
